title.en: A Brief Prayer to Sera Khandro

text.en: Principal of all three-kāya ḍākinīs, Vajravārāhī,
Manifesting in magical wisdom form as the yoginī:
text.en-trans: yeshe gyumé kur zheng naljor ma

text.en: Kunzang Chönyi Wangmo, to you I pray!
Holding us inseparably in this life, future lives and in the bardo,
text.en-trans: di chi bar sum dralmé jé zung té

text.en: May we perfect realization of luminosity, the fundamental nature,
text.en-trans: ösal neluk tokpa tar chin né

text.en: And thereby awaken as Samantabhadra within primordial purity!
text.en-trans: kadak kuntu zangpor chang chub shok
